error.message: Bad value text/html for attribute content on element meta: The legacy encoding declaration did not start with text/html;.
error.explanation:
Syntax of legacy character encoding declaration:
The string text/html;, optionally followed by whitespace, followed by charset=, followed by a preferred encoding name according to the Encoding Standard. Example: text/html; charset=utf-8
✉

error.message: The itemprop attribute was specified, but the element is not a property of any item.
error.explanation: ✉
